plot: Old Kui and his son Erzi use an old car in Shenzhen to transport tourists but are cheated by the manager of the resort they work for.
title: Fu zi lao ye che
plot_es: Old Kui and his son Erzi use an old car in Shenzhen to transport tourists but are cheated by the manager of the resort they work for.
plot_en: Old Kui and his son Erzi use an old car in Shenzhen to transport tourists but are cheated by the manager of the resort they work for.
